titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
Petitjean
Swifts Choice Works
from. March. 1. 1935.
Sally Bowles
from. Dec. 16. 1937.
PETITJEAN 1934 CAILLOIS Chasseur Petijean Roger Peloton dep E.O.R. 2 rue Parmentier 2e. section Vitry s/ Seine 23 R.T.A. Monsieur Armand Petitjean Morhange Les Vallières (Moselle) Ville d'Avray SZO 1 m 1 v 12 dep ref Feb 2 50
Jan 6 Meaning of Meaning 16 16 Bridge H Crane Feb 2 16 Mysteries of Udolpho 0.50 Jan 23 " 23 Poems of Gerard Manley Hopkins 0.50 30 30 Rymbolism (Whitehead) 0.50 Feb 2
Renewed Feb 17 - March 17 1934 12v dep 8v
Feb 17 Ways of Behaviourism 23 23 Contemporaries & snobs March 6 March 6 Blake complete works Nonesuch ed. ren. March 27 March 9 Hound & Horn F. Damon's article March 23 Renewed March 17 - April 17 1934 12v March 27 After Strange Gods 0.50 6 April 6 April Bridge. (Crane) 20 " 20 " An Experiment with Time May 1st subr expired 17th Renewed April 17 - May 17 1934 12v May 1st Auden's Poems 0.50 May 8 " 8 May 15. Yeats Poems May 25
Renewed Sept 21 - Oct 21 1934 12v Sept 21 Ignatius Loyola CAILLOIS 12 Oct. 12 Oct. Plays (Ford) Mermaid 20 " 26 History of Europe in the 19th Cent. 0.50 13 - 13 Nov. Hope for poetry 0.50 owes extras 26 Renewed Oct 21 - Nov 21 1934 1 m 15v
Renewed Nov 21 - Dec 21 1934 15v
Nov 26 Vienna 4 Dec (Fableaux) 10 4 Dec - Paleface 17 17 Make it New 0.50 18 Jan
1935 owes 1 month. 26 March. Coleridge on imagination 26 " Colour + colour Theories 6 April Oct 1 Irish Names of Places vols I - II Oct 26 returned Feb. 27. Swifts Verse. March 2 27. Life + Friendships of Swift 2 March 1 Swifts choice works 1 Jonathan Swifts bibliography. March 6 23 History of Eighteenth Century Literature. May 11 Do what you will
Manuscript in drawer marked 'Papers for. Abonnés' to be returned to Monsieur Petitjean Dec 16 - Satires of Jonathan Swift. Janv. 14 16 Sally Bowles back
